results.title: Effects of statin monotherapy versus statin plus ezetimibe combination on serum uric acid levels.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To compare the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ 10/10 mg, @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg, and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ 10 mg daily on serum @CHEMICAL_Uric_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014527 @@@uric acid@@@ levels in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Dyslipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Moutzouri E, Liberopoulos EN, Florentin M, Liamis G, Elisaf MS. Effects of statin monotherapy versus statin plus ezetimibe combination on serum uric acid levels. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol Ther. 2013 Jan;18(1):13-8. PMID: 22539817
